title: Dodgeball Syndra
body: Seriously, have her in gym clothes with those big red rubber balls floating around her.  It would be great! When she ults she could blow a whistle and point at her target as all the dodgeballs hit them (or conversely yell DODGEBALL!).  Just think of the distinct noise those big rubber balls make!  I would buy that skin in a heartbeat.  Also, bonus points if her joke is the 5 d's of dodgeball (those being dodge, duck, dip, dive and dodge).

replies.body: {{champion:134}} *"If you can dodge a wrench, you can dodge a ball!"*

> [{quoted}](name=Aura Master Fox,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EI7sVt8m,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-29T07:00:17.095+0000)
>
> {{champion:134}} *"If you can dodge a wrench, you can dodge a ball!"*

But heimer autos aren't skillshots :D
{{champion:134}} If you can dodge a global ult you can dodge a ball
I say it'd have to be "If you can dodge a Q.." or "If you can dodge a rocket/axe/arrow/missile" to reference global ults.
I'd buy the shit out of that skin.
Syndra main here, so i ship it :3
This needs to happen. I love Syndra and a champion and character--hence the name SYNDRAome. But yeah this is a silly neat concept; I'd buy.

Ah. Wondered when another one of these would pop up. They come around every so often. Doesn't make any Rioters listen, of course. Otherwise, we'd probably have Dodgeball Sindra, and I'd probably be playing her. 'Tis a shame. :/

Don't forget this 1-2 year old splash art.
http://fc04.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2014/056/4/0/dodgeball_syndra__league_of_legends__by_gevurah_studios-d77xz0s.jpg
